00017 W.WFCKeditor = function(id, path, value){var self = this;
00018     // apply modification
00019     applyModification()
00020     // initiate an object
00021     this.core = new FCKeditor(id) ;
00022     this.core.BasePath = path;
00023     this.core.Value = value;
00024     this.core.Create();
00025     this.body = this.core.body;
00026     // add it to WPS
00027     W.add(this);
00028 
00029     function applyModification(){
00030         FCKeditor.prototype.body = document.createElement('div');
00031         FCKeditor.prototype.wps = '';
00032         FCKeditor.prototype.parent = {};
00033         FCKeditor.prototype.Create = function()
00034         {
00035             // Check for errors
00036             if ( !this.InstanceName || this.InstanceName.length == 0 )
00037             {
00038                 this._ThrowError( 701, 'You must specify an instance name.' ) ;
00039                 return ;
00040             }
00041             this.Width = '100%';
00042             this.Height = '100%';
00043             var str = '';
00044             if ( !this.CheckBrowser || this._IsCompatibleBrowser() )
00045             {
00046                 str += '<input type="hidden" id="' + this.InstanceName + '" name="' + this.InstanceName + '" value="' + this._HTMLEncode( this.Value ) + '" style="display:none" />'  ;
00047                 str += this._GetConfigHtml();
00048                 str += this._GetIFrameHtml() ;
00049             }
00050             else
00051             {
00052                 var sWidth  = this.Width.toString().indexOf('%')  > 0 ? this.Width  : this.Width  + 'px' ;
00053                 var sHeight = this.Height.toString().indexOf('%') > 0 ? this.Height : this.Height + 'px' ;
00054                 str += '<textarea name="' + this.InstanceName + '" rows="4" cols="40" style="WIDTH: ' + sWidth + '; HEIGHT: ' + sHeight + '">' + this._HTMLEncode( this.Value ) + '<\/textarea>';
00055             }
00056             this.body.innerHTML = str;
00057         }
00058     };
00059 };
